content.rendered:
Earler this year Joseph Visconi became the second LAWS graduate to attend law school. 

At 22 years of age, he alreay knows he wants to use the law to help others. 

“My most vivid memory was the first time Danielle came into my classroom and pitched the LAWS. She said something along the lines of ‘with law you can actually make a change. You can really make an impact on your city, on your country, and your province.’ That was the beginning of my curiosity toward the legal field.”

You can read the whole article here.
